price: Ntumwa y’Imana! Ndarahiye Jewe Allah kw’izina ry’Imana yawe Rurema, ko abahakana izuka ry’ibiremwa, Twebwe Allah Dutegerezwa kuzobegeraniriza hamwe n’amashetani ku musi w’izuka; hanyuma ni ukuri, Tuzobakumakumira hambavu y’umuriro wa Jahannamu bapfukamye, badashoboye no guhaguruka!
arabic: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَحۡشُرَنَّهُمۡ وَٱلشَّيَٰطِينَ ثُمَّ لَنُحۡضِرَنَّهُمۡ حَوۡلَ جَهَنَّمَ جِثِيّٗا

meta.transliteration: fawarabbika lanaḥshurannahum wal-shayāṭīna thumma lanuḥ'ḍirannahum ḥawla jahannama jithiyyan
